name: Tenami
description:
Tenami is the premier platform for viewing parties that allows users to sync content and login information across multiple streaming platforms such as Twitch or Crunchyroll and view it all in one hub. Join a lobby midway through with 1,000s of others, or host a session with your closest friends. View the reaction of your community with the integrated Twitch chat, or follow along with the party games while watching the video at your own pace!

Key Features:

  • Join or Host Anime Viewing Parties
Watch your favorite anime with your favorite twitch streamers and friends. By joining a viewing party you will automatically sync up your local video to whatever the host is watching.

  • Join Lobbies Midway Through
Late to the party? That's okay! You can join lobbies after the show has already started and catch right back up to the action with everyone else.
